name: Zowasel
description: Zowasel is a vetted agriculture marketplace to buy and sell crops. The company received $100k in funding as part of the UN World Food Programmeâ€™s Zero Hunger Sprint.

name: Gameconomy
description: Gameconomy provides backend analytics, marketplaces, in-game currency and data for games developers. A majority stake in the company was acquired by iCandy Interactive in January 2022.

name: TravelerCar
description: TravelCar is a leading European car-rental marketplace. The company raised more than $22M in funding before being acquired by Groupe PSA in 2019.

name: Realty Mogul
description: RealtyMogul is a leading marketplace for real estate investing, connecting borrowers, and sponsors to individual and institutional investors. The company has raised more than $45M+ funding.

name: GoPlaceIt
description: GoPlaceIt is a real estate marketplace for commercial and residential property search and alerts, as well as to lease, buy and sell. They raised $5M+ and were acquired by Capitalizarme in April 2022.

name: MSJ Holdings Ltd.
description: SmartChoice is an insurance marketplace for users to easily compare policies and buy instantly from top providers. They have raised pre-seed funding, and powered 3M+ comparisons to date.

name: Babonbo
description: Babonbo is a baby-gear rental marketplace & service that connects traveling families with local parents and businesses. They have raised $450k in Angel investment.
